tree.name: Adou Thiero
tree.tradeDescription: 7-team trade: Lakers acquired Thiero from Nets, sent cash and Rocco Zikarsky to Timberwolves
tree.note: Arkansas forward, originally drafted 31st overall in 2024 by Nets

assetsGivenUp.name: Rocco Zikarsky
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Lakers traded Lachlan Olbrich and cash to Bulls for Zikarsky
assetsGivenUp.note: Australian center, acquired from Bulls day before 7-team trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Lachlan Olbrich
assetsGivenUp.note: Drafted 55th overall by Lakers in 2025 NBA Draft
